#Objective of Getting and Cleaning Data Project
Read , Analyze and Clean data which was about  "Human Activity Recognition Using Smartphones" data set and to make it look tidy.

#Basic Steps or Pre-requisites for this project
1.Set the working directory
2.Download the zip file from the data source and unzip it in the working directory.
3.reshape2 package to be loaded for project purposes

#Starting with the project
1.Run the run_analysis.R file step-by-step
2.Output is stored as a variable named final_data and also the output has been wrote down to a file named tidy.txt

*For more details, please refer the codebook.md file*
